main.not_enough_balance: Not enough balance to pay transaction

sending.title: Sending TON
sending.message:
Please wait a few seconds for your
transaction to be processed...

receive.title: Receive TON
receive.description: Share this address to receive TON
receive.check_device: Please check the address on your device

invoice.title: Create invoice
invoice.description:
You can specify the amount and purpose of
the payment to save the sender some time
invoice.instruction: Share this address to receive TON
invoice.amount_placeholder: Amount in TON you expect to receive

send.title: Send TON
send.description: Copy the 48-letter wallet address of the recipient here or ask them to send you a ton:// link

send.note: Note: your comment will not be encrypted

sign.note: Signing custom data is very dangerous. Use only if you know what you are doing

ledger.title: Connect Ledger
ledger.support: Please use Edge/Google Chrome v89 or later.
ledger.reconnect: If it does not connect, then try reconnecting the device.
ledger.version: Please update your Ledger TON-app to v2.0.1 or upper

logout.title: Log out
logout.description:
This will disconnect the wallet from this
app. You will be able to restore your
wallet using 24 secret words - or import
another wallet.
logout.transfer:
Wallets are located in the decentralized
TON Blockchain. If you want the wallet to
be deleted simply transfer all the TON
from it and leave it empty.

magic.title: What is TON Magic?
magic.description: TON Magic provides native Telegram integration by patching the official Telegram web app (Z version).
magic.info: Turn it on to send and receive Toncoins from any Telegram user.

start.description:
Application allows you to make fast and
secure blockchain-based payments
without intermediaries

create.title: Congratulations!
create.description: Your TON wallet has just been created.
create.instruction:
To be able to always have access to it,
please set up a secure password and write
down secret words.

save.description:
Write down these 24 words in the correct
order and store them in secret place.
save.instruction:
Use these secret words to restore access to
your wallet if you lose your password or
access to this device.
save.alert_message: You didn't have enough time to write these words down

confirm.title: Test time!
confirm.description:
Now let's check that you wrote your secret
words correctly.
confirm.alert_message: The secret words you have entered do not match the ones in the list

import.description:
Please restore access to your non-hardware wallet by
entering the 24 secret words you wrote
down when creating the wallet
import.alert_message: Without the secret words, you can't restore access to your wallet

create_password.title: Secure Password
create_password.description:
Please choose a secure password
for confirming your payments

ready.title: Ready to go!
ready.description:
You're all set. Now you have a wallet that
only you control - directly, without
middlemen or bankers

mode_switch.net_title: Are you sure you want to switch between mainnet/testnet?
mode_switch.net_message: You can switch back the network by clicking on the version with the Shift key pressed
mode_switch.debug_title: Are you sure you want to switch between default/debug mode?
mode_switch.debug_message: You can switch back the mode by clicking on the version with the Alt key pressed

xss_attention.title: Attention!
xss_attention.message:
Using this console, you can be exposed to a Self-XSS attack, allowing attackers to take over your wallet.
Do not enter or paste program code that you do not understand.
